headline: Jimmy Dean Sausage Stuffing
name: Jimmy Dean Sausage Stuffing
description: Jimmy Dean® sausage is the secret ingredient in this flavorful stuffing dish seasoned with rosemary and garlic.
recipeIngredient: 2 (16 ounce) packages Regular Flavor Jimmy Dean Pork Sausage
0.75 cup diced or coarsely grated carrots
1 (10 ounce) package frozen spinach, thawed and drained
1 (15 ounce) package herbed dry bread cubes

recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan or stockpot, cook sausage over medium-high heat, stirring frequently until thoroughly cooked and no longer pink. Add mushrooms, onion, carrots, celery and garlic; cook 10-12 minutes or until onion is translucent, stirring frequently. Transfer mixture to a large bowl; add remaining ingredients and stir well. Pour into a buttered 4-quart casserole.
